description: A staple of cold and wet weather days, this insulated jacket combines seam-sealed waterproofing with the breathable warmth of an Omni-Heat™  Infinity thermal-reflective lining. It’s protective and durable, with plenty of pockets.
name: Columbia Sportswear Oak Harbor Insulated Jacket - Tall - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester, 100% Polyester 2L Ripstop, Omni-Heat™ Synthetic Down 100% Recycled Polyester
